text: wtqwl lahum almlaykt: nahn ansarkm fi alhayat aldnya, nsddkm wnhfzkm bi'amr allh, wkdhlk nakun maeakum fi alakhrt, walakum fi aljanat kula ma tashtahih 'anfusakum mimaa tkhtarwnh, wtaqarr bih aeynkm, wamahma tlbtm min shay' wjdtmwh bayn 'aydikum dyaft w'ineamana lakum min ghafur ldhnwbkm, rahim bkm
